frontmatter.title: Braised Ribs in Tomato Sauce with Turnips and Parsnips, Served with Garlic Butter Mash
frontmatter.description: Tender ribs braised in a rich tomato sauce with hearty vegetables, served alongside creamy garlic butter mashed potatoes.
frontmatter.author: Benjamin Degryse

image.alt: Braised Ribs in Tomato Sauce with Turnips and Parsnips
